programs.program:
as principal admin password "admin" do
create principal bob "bob"
set x = "x"
set delegation x admin delegate -> bob
return ""
***

as principal bob password "bob" do
delete delegation x bob delegate -> bob
return ""
***

as principal bob password "bob" do
set delegation x bob delegate -> bob
return ""
***

as principal bob password "bob" do
delete delegation x bob delegate -> bob
return ""
***

as principal bob password "bob" do
set delegation x bob read -> bob
return x
***
